credit_line: Museum purchase through gift of various donors
title: Chairs
medium: Pen and brown ink, brush and brown wash, graphite, on paper
description: Top center: side profile of a side chair on wheels.  To the right is a front profile of an armchair with a rectangular back.  Bottom row:  front, side and rear profiles of an armchair with a rounded back.  At center drawings of two types of claw foots.
name: Drawing
